content: It feels like an alarm clock is ringing in my ear, reminding me that I'm going to be late for school...

content: The starlight last night seemed to be telling me... {A心虚目移}Hmmm... there were a lot of people catching up on holiday homework? Ah, it's the first day of school today.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-1005幻雪_特殊反馈

content: Although it's been years since I graduated, whenever it's the first day of term, I feel like the next time I open my eyes I'll... {A焦虑}find out these last few years were all just a dream.
info: 日常对话-日常特殊反馈-节日-开学日-1005幻雪_特殊反馈
